channel.title: Python on Kiprono Elijah Koech
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Kiprono Elijah Koech

item.title: Post 4
item.description: Notes for Self Use hugo server -D to open a local server which renderes drafts. By default, hugo organizes posts by date. If you want to override that provide the weight: <int> on the front-matter. The smaller the <int the higher the article in the list. I have provided the value 2 for this article. Some MarkDown Syntax Itemized list on Markdown: 1 2 3 4 5 - Item 1 - Item 2 - sub item 1 - sub item 2 - Item 3 Rendered as: Item 1 Item 2 sub item 1 sub item 2 Item 3 Numbered list on Markdown: 1 2 3 4 5 1. Item 1 1. Item 2 1. sub item 1 1. sub item 2 1. Item 3 Item 1 Item 2 sub item 1 sub item 2 Item 3 Conclusion This is the conclusion Use at least H2 on the title headings.
